title: First Ward Loft for Rent - Brick Walls - Industrial Vibe
posting_body: About ME: My name is Angel and I am a real estate broker helping people to rent apartments in Houston!
I have over 13 years of experience as a former apartment manager and as an apartment locator/realtor.
I can also show you private options, such as single family homes, townhomes, lofts, condos, and high-rises.
Google Angel Fultz Realty for reviews and more info about me!
Call or Email me for personalized options.
I am compensated by the property, not by the client which makes it TOTALLY FREE to you!
Let me know what you are searching for!
There are really good deals right now on new and old construction.
Realtor/Advertiser: Angel with Angel Fultz Realty
Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.
This property doesn't accept broken leases or evictions************
************NO SHORT-TERM LEASING / NO CORPORATE LEASING / NO AIR BNB
